p: A significant ( p ≤ 0.01) cytoprotective effect of Gsp on HL‐7702 cells induced by BaP was observed at 63 mg/L, compared to the untreated cells (Figure 6). It was found that cells viability notably ( p ≤ 0.01) increased with Gsp concentrations, indicating that Gsp could protect liver cells from BaP‐induced injury.
